Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Relates to the definition of Vietnam veteran
Summary: Conforms the definition of a veteran serving in the Vietnam war era to newly enacted federal law (H.R. 7105) for veterans who served in-country in the Republic of Vietnam from between February 28, 1961 and May 7, 1975, to any active duty service in the Republic of Vietnam that occurred between November 1, 1955 and May 7, 1975.
LawCode: Amd §458-a, RPT L; amd §364, Exec L; amd §§668, 668-c & 669-a, Ed L; amd §2632, Pub Health L; amd §85, Civ Serv L; amd §63, Pub Off L; amd §156, Pub Hous L; amd §168, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, the executive law, the education law, the public health law, the civil service law, the public officers law, the public housing law and the social services law, in relation to conforming the definition of a veteran serving in the Vietnam war era to newly enacted federal law (H.R. 7105) for veterans who served in-country in the Republic of Vietnam from between February 28, 1961 and May 7, 1975, to any active duty service in the Republic of Vietnam that occurred between November 1, 1955 and May 7, 1975
